    • getById

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> ContainerPe getById​(java.util.List<T> peList, int id)
      Gets MIPS Rating for a specified Pe ID.
      参数:
      id - the Pe ID
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      the MIPS rating if exists, otherwise returns -1

    • getMips

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> int getMips​(java.util.List<T> peList, int id)
      Gets MIPS Rating for a specified Pe ID.
      参数:
      id - the Pe ID
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      the MIPS rating if exists, otherwise returns -1

    • getTotalMips

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> int getTotalMips​(java.util.List<T> peList)
      Gets total MIPS Rating for all PEs.
      参数:
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      the total MIPS Rating

    • getMaxUtilization

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> double getMaxUtilization​(java.util.List<T> peList)
      Gets the max utilization among by all PEs.
      参数:
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      the utilization

    • getMaxUtilizationAmongVmsPes

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> double getMaxUtilizationAmongVmsPes​(java.util.List<T> peList, Container container)
      Gets the max utilization among by all PEs allocated to the VM.
      参数:
      container - the container
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      the utilization

    • getFreePe

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> ContainerPe getFreePe​(java.util.List<T> peList)
      Gets a Pe ID which is FREE.
      参数:
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      a Pe ID if it is FREE, otherwise returns -1

    • getNumberOfFreePes

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> int getNumberOfFreePes​(java.util.List<T> peList)
      Gets the number of FREE or non-busy Pe.
      参数:
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      number of Pe

    • setPeStatus

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> boolean setPeStatus​(java.util.List<T> peList, int id, int status)
      Sets the Pe status.
      参数:
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      id - the id
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      true if the Pe status has been changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)

    • getNumberOfBusyPes

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> int getNumberOfBusyPes​(java.util.List<T> peList)
      Gets the number of BUSY Pe.
      参数:
      peList - the pe list
      返回:
      number of Pe

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> void setStatusFailed​(java.util.List<T> peList, java.lang.String resName, int hostId, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED. NOTE: resName and machineID are used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use
      参数:
      resName - the name of the resource
      hostId - the id of this machine
      failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends ContainerPe> void setStatusFailed​(java.util.List<T> peList, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED.
      参数:
      failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter
      peList - the pe list
